Text:
Critical film, thank you. The first step in stopping inheritance class thieves like the Kochs...ALEC... Chamber of Commerce... State Policy Network, et al... is to shine a light on what they are doing to us all. Buncha punk ass bullies using daddy's money to maintain the second gilded age. They all need to swing... Nothin' else'll stop 'em.

Thx MVGroup! Thx seeders!

Will see indefinitely
